author: Jake Thomas
title: Tucker Carlson Tones Down Pro-Russia Rhetoric After Appearing on Russian TV
description: The Fox News personality decried the conflict in Ukraine Thursday, days after expressing sympathy for Russian leader Vladimir Putin.
content:
Tucker Carlson is taking a decidedly muted tone when addressing Russia's war with Ukraine, just a day after being featured on Russian TV for his praise of Vladimir Putin.
